verses.roman:
candanādi lañā prabhu vasilā sei sthāne
'āmāra āge āji tumi karaha bhojane'

synonyms: candana-ādi lañā—accepting the sandalwood pulp and other items; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vasilā—sat down; sei sthāne—at that place; āmāra āge—in front of Me; āji—now; tumi—you; karaha—perform; bhojane—eating.
translation: Accepting the sandalwood pulp and garland, the Lord sat down and said, "Now, in front of Me, you must eat."
